titles.title: To make improvements in the Hope for Homeowners Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 111-12.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 4.
